fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.TwoWayCI

  • Packages that use TwoWayCI 
    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors
    Hierarchy of connector objects to assemble components.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.connectors
    Connectors for the ping pong example.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.interfaces
    Interfaces for the ping pong example.

    Ports for the ping pong example.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces
    Types of offered and required interfaces for components.
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports
    Hierarchy of ports to expose interfaces of components and interconnect them.

    • Uses of TwoWayCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors with type parameters of type TwoWayCI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractTwoWayConnector<TWI extends TwoWayCI>
      The class AbstractTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic connector between components calling each others services in a peer to peer way rather than in a client-provider relationship.
      protected static class  AbstractTwoWayConnector.ProxyToOtherComponent<TWI extends TwoWayCI>
      The abstract class ProxyToOtherComponent defines the baseline properties for the management of proxies forwarding calls to the other component for an identified sender.
      Subinterfaces of TwoWayCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataTwoWayConnectorI
      The interface DataTwoWayConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others, but using the same interface on both sides and act as peers in the exchange.
      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors that implement TwoWayCI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayConnector
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic data connector between components exchanging data in a peer to peer way rather than calling each others services.
      protected static class  AbstractTwoWayConnector.ProxyToOtherComponent<TWI extends TwoWayCI>
      The abstract class ProxyToOtherComponent defines the baseline properties for the management of proxies forwarding calls to the other component for an identified sender.
      class  DataTwoWayConnector
      The class DataTwoWayConnector implements a standard connector for components exchanging data in a peer-to-peer mode using standard data two-way interfaces.
      protected static class  DataTwoWayConnector.ProxyToOtherComponent
      The class ProxyToOtherComponent implements a directional proxy that can forward a call to the other port when the sender port identifies itself with its URI.

    • Uses of TwoWayCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.interfaces

      Subinterfaces of TwoWayCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.interfaces 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  PingPongTwoWayCI
      The interface PingPongTwoWayCI defines the service pingPong() called by each player to send the control to the other player.

    • Uses of TwoWayCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.ports

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.examples.pingpong.ports that implement TwoWayCI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PingPongDataTwoWayPort
      The class PingPongDataTwoWayPort implements the methods send of the DataTwoWayCI.PushCI interface, but throws an exception for the method request of the DataTwoWayCI.PullCI interface.
      class  PingPongTwoWayPort
      The class PingPongTwoWayPort implements the two way port for the PingPongI interface.
      protected static class  PingPongTwoWayPort.PingPongOutProxy
      The class OutProxy implements an object that forwards calls through the interface PingPongTwoWayI to the other peer component.

    • Uses of TwoWayCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces

      Subinterfaces of TwoWayCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataTwoWayCI
      The component interface TwoWayDataCI enables two components to exchange data in a peer-to-peer way, that is the two components implement the same component interface and have both the sender and receiver roles.

    • Uses of TwoWayCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports with type parameters of type TwoWayCI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractTwoWayPort<TWI extends TwoWayCI>
      The class AbstractTwoWayPort partially implements a two-way port for components calling each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.
      protected static class  AbstractTwoWayPort.OutProxy<T extends TwoWayCI>
      The class OutProxy implements an object that forwards calls through a two way interface to the other peer component.
      interface  TwoWayPortI<TWI extends TwoWayCI>
      The interface TwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming and outgoing calls among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.
      Subinterfaces of TwoWayCI in fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  TwoWayPortI<TWI extends TwoWayCI>
      The interface TwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming and outgoing calls among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayPort
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayPort partially implements a data two-way port for components exchanging data with each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.
      protected static class  AbstractDataTwoWayPort.OutProxy
      The class OutProxy implements a proxy object that forwards calls to the connector and to the other component.
      class  AbstractTwoWayPort<TWI extends TwoWayCI>

      protected static class  AbstractTwoWayPort.OutProxy<T extends TwoWayCI>
